msg: use newest jetty plugin. From now on mvn cocoon:deploy jetty:run

author: minchau
msg: Part of the patch in XALANJ-2050 that I forgot

author: jmcconnell
msg: if there is a cycle detected on a scheduled build of a project group then all projects would be built unordered, no just the projects in that project group, so fix it so that only those projects in that project group would be built unsorted
